buginformation.summary: json property access access read only unexpected behaviour
buginformation.description: hey was hoping make use json property access access read only but failed assume this class public class test pojo private string first name private string last name json property access access read only public string get full name return first name last name public string get first name return first name public void set first name string first name this first name first name public string get last name return last name public void set last name string last name this last name last name couldn find way stop the deserializer from attempting deserialize the field full name the only thing that helps create setter and annotate with json ignore however that setter does not make sense and don want have this bug behaviour missing something thanks the text was updated successfully but these errors were encountered copy link member cowtowncoder commented sep 2015 that does sound like bug indeed which version are you using copy link member cowtowncoder commented sep 2015 whoa there unit test coverage for value read only that should not the case wonder there could bug lurking there copy link member cowtowncoder commented sep 2015 can reproduce this with looks like read only does actually hide remove setter method test fails with unknown property but will not mark ignorable which probably should cowtowncoder added commit that referenced this issue sep 2015 add failing test for 935 73b 072 copy link member cowtowncoder commented sep 2015 added failing test case for this but not sure how easy will pipe ignore information thank you for reporting the problem again copy link author weaselmetal commented sep 2015 thanks for dealing with the issue and sorry for the lack details description afaik access read only has just been added also got the unrecognized property exception unrecognized field full name not marked ignorable copy link member cowtowncoder commented sep 2015 correct only which why realized that asking for version wasn fully necessary but only after asking the fix would essentially carry along the name ignorable property similar how json ignore tracked but need see how that plumbing handled since discovery occurs bit different place copy link mewert commented feb 2016 there some easy workaround until this fixed mean instead implementing noop setter method the annotation json ignore properties sounds like could help here but also has effect add getter regardless which values choose for allow getters allow setters update seems that found solution adding json ignore properties value some field allow getters true allow setters false the class this could solution don need the json ignore properties annotation class level for other purposes copy link member cowtowncoder commented feb 2016 plattfish thank you for sharing this hoping address this along with some issues with creator property handling copy link thedoctor commented aug 2016 any movement here just bumped into this issue copy link heruan commented sep 2016 don know related but experiencing this with map public class ticket json property access access read only json serialize using map array serializer class public sorted map timer integer get service timers all works serialization but deserialization ticket get this exception can not find map key deserializer for type simple type class timer source java sequence input stream
